summary: Each year, we make more than 1,000 recommendations to help improve the federal government. We alert department heads to the recommendations where they can save the most money, address issues on our High Risk List , or significantly improve government operations. This report outlines our 35 priority open recommendations for Office of Management and Budget as of April 2020. For example, we made 7 priority...
title: Priority Open Recommendations: Office of Management and Budget
